column4: On another note, I go to slingo.com and go to play a game in firefox it asks me to install a plugin but when I go to install it it says there's no suitable plugin. Can someone help me fix this?
It looks like shockwave, which won't work on linux (even with the Adobe Flash plugin installed)
Sign the petition if you're upset about it, http://www.gopetition.com/petitions/shockwave-on-linux.html
Since shockwave uses DirectX which does not exist on linux, using WINE will not do much about solving it
